name: Arthur Adventure
description:
Arthur Adventure its a puzzle game, where you will control Arthur a nice robot, created by an alien who its stock in the earth try to get back to his planet, the mission of Arthur its to recolect diferent parts to build a space ship and can scape from this planet.

FEATURED FEATURES

Metal power

Arthur has the ability to lift metal objects such as boxes and platforms and move them as the player desires either from top to bottom or turn them in different directions, allowing different ways to solve puzzles that are presented throughout the game.

I will face Siege Machines

The area where Arthur is located is heavily guarded by the multiple turrets that attack when they see you, the player will have to improvise different strategies to move around the area without being detected by the machines.

Interesting Puzzles

Arthur will have to face several challenges where he will face his ability with metal to pass through different areas and reach the desired places.
